pkgmetadata.longdescription: Human IMR90 Fibroblast HiC data from Dixon et al. 2012 // The HiC data from Human Fibroblast IMR90 cell line (HindIII restriction) was retrieved from the GEO website, accession number GSE35156 (http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/query/acc.cgi?acc=GSE35156). The raw reads were processed as explained in Dixon et al. (Nature 2012).
